entry.dcterms:description: the purpose of the research was to track the changes in the life conditions, life style, activity, the stucture of consumption preferences of lawyers as affected by the social transformation; main topics: current status, work and family situation, family background, social mobility, cultural consumption, financial situation, life style, political attitudes, religious affiliation, proficiency in foreign languages
